thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 36 of 948
thread.title: Thomas

author: Thomas
title: Thomas
text:
I didn't hear about Bundle Stars till looking through other sources till I ended up here. Before I did anything, I checked with others to make sure the site was legitimate. All the posts I looked at where positive about BS, so I gave it a go.
As of today, I have been using Bundle Stars a lot and only recently got the Darksiders Franchise Pack. Which was a simple purchase with my PayPal (Credit/Debit can be used too) and keys are sent to you, in less than a minute.
I'd rather do my game shopping here because the codes are from legit sources, unlike those on other sites that are done by sellers which you don't know, are in legal rights of that code.
